text: The Other Guy is an Australian comedy television series which screens on Stan. The series is written by and stars comedian Matt Okine. A second season was released on 13 December 2019. ==Synopsis== The series is about a successful radio host who finds himself unexpectedly back in the dating pool for the first time in a decade, after discovering his long-term girlfriend has been having an affair with his best friend. ==Cast== *Matt Okine as AJ Amon *Valene Kane as Olivia Collins *Harriet Dyer as Stevie Nicholls *Michael Hing as Sam Wu *Michael-Anthony Taylor as Daddy Mack *Christiaan Van Vuuren as Derek *Luke Ford as Henry ==Episodes== ===Series overview=== ===Season 1=== ===Season 2=== ==References== Category:2017 Australian television series debuts Category:2017 Australian television series endings Category:English-language television shows Category:Australian comedy television series
title: The Other Guy (TV series)
